definition: Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
abbr. for the Philippines 菲律賓|菲律宾[Fei1 lu:4 bin1]

sentences.english: "But Lulu and Sophia are different people, " Jed pointed out.
sentences.chinese: “可露露和蘇菲婭是不同的個體啊，”傑德說。

sentences.english: I want to thank you as well, Sophia.
In a word, Sophia was in love with him to distraction.
sentences.chinese: 簡單一句話，蘇菲亞愛他愛得神魂顛倒了。

sentences.english: Sophie's mother starts to wonder why all of her ex-boyfriends are showing up on the island.
sentences.chinese: 蘇菲的母親開始納悶爲何她的前男友全出現在島上。

sentences.english: We'll have to start when Sophia gets back.
sentences.chinese: 必須等蘇菲亞回來再開始。

sentences.english: Sylvia, as you announced so melodramatically to the world.
sentences.chinese: 蘇菲亞，正如剛剛鬧着對世界所宣稱的一樣。

sentences.english: Sophia Pickles is a logistics officer for a non-governmental organization called GOAL.
sentences.chinese: 蘇菲亞皮克是一家非政府機構GOAL的後勤人員。

sentences.english: 'Sufei's Diary' demonstrates how swiftly online advertising is changing here.
sentences.chinese: 《蘇菲日記》展示出網絡廣告的變化有多迅速。

sentences.english: When I got home, I called Sofia over and over again, but she wouldn't pick up the phone.
sentences.chinese: 我回到家後一直打電話給蘇菲亞，但她不肯接電話。

sentences.english: Sophia added a touch of glamour by wearing a beautiful dress.
sentences.chinese: 蘇菲亞穿了一件漂亮的衣服，更增添了一份迷人的美。

sentences.english: Julien became friends with Sophie, the price is beaten by dad.
sentences.chinese: 於連跟蘇菲成了朋友，代價是被老爹暴打。

sentences.english: Sophie had fallen in love with a suspect beam core course, taught her to test one.
sentences.chinese: 蘇菲懷疑梁芯已愛上一然，更教她試探一然。

sentences.english: Let's have Sophie show you one more time.
sentences.chinese: 我們來讓蘇菲再教你一次。

sentences.english: In one episode, she battles her pimples with Clinique's skin care cosmetics.
sentences.chinese: 劇中的一個場景是蘇菲用倩碧護膚化妝品戰勝青春痘。

sentences.english: The mysterious letters had made Sophie's head spin.
sentences.chinese: 這兩封神祕的信把蘇菲攪得頭暈腦脹。

sentences.english: She gives the bewildered Octavian to Sophie and quietly leaves the room.
sentences.chinese: 她將迷惑不解的奧克塔維交給蘇菲，靜靜離去。

definition: to be furious/to fly into a terrible rage
locked in (with the door locked from the outside)
Longchuan county in Heyuan 河源[He2 yuan2], Guangdong/Ryongchon, town in North Korea
